page.title: 08Tourism-A Survey of Campers.
page.content: About thirty five campers filled in our question sheet. We were interested to find out about their holiday likes and dislikes and why they chose this area to spend a holiday. Of those we interviewed over half came from London and most of them said that they like to get away from the noise and hurly-burly of the city. Over three-quarters of them own their own caravans and have sited them at Reculver for over ten years.They don't seem to mind coming back to the same place time after time. Most of them spend weekends at Reculver and come down at Easter for the first time, making their last visit in September.
